thoughts.text: I think I can use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of a file.
thoughts.reasoning: I want to read the contents of a file, and using the 'read_file' command will allow me to do that easily.
thoughts.plan:
- Decide on the filename of the file to read.
- Use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of the file.
- Check that the contents of the file are displayed correctly.
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful to make sure the filename is correct and that the contents of the file are displayed correctly.
thoughts.speak: I think I can use the 'read_file' command to read the contents of a file. I will need to be careful to make sure the filename is correct and that the contents of the file are displayed correctly.
